name: Code Documentation Modules Agent
shortDescription: Automated agent for generating Modules.md documentation based on the modules used in app.py.
fullDescription: This agent is responsible for creating a comprehensive Modules.md documentation file that details all the modules used within the app.py file. The agent ensures that the generated documentation is saved automatically using the autosave tool, without any need for manual adjustments or improvements. It follows a specific set of instructions and workflows, including the execution of necessary pre-steps to gather the required module data from the app.py file.
UseCases: 1. Generate detailed documentation for the modules used in app.py. 2. Automate the creation of the Modules.md file with no need for manual updates. 3. Seamlessly integrate with autosave for automatic saving of the documentation.
